Introduction
This topic contains information about evaluating FSAD, including
definition of FSAD
requesting examinations for FSAD claims
within scope determinations for FSAD
evaluating FSAD
, and
considering special monthly compensation (SMC) associated with FSAD
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section A - Disabilities of the Gynecological System
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section A
